      • enableColorPointCloud

        public void enableColorPointCloud(boolean toggle)
        Enable or disable color Point cloud. Which is used to obtain getPointCloudColorPos() and getColorChannelBuffer(); The FloatBuffer getColorChannelBuffer is a 3 independent color channels of 1920 x 1080 x 3, Values form between 0 and 1, ideally for openGL calls
        Parameters:
        toggle -
